Name: A Book of Beasts and Buddies
About the game: A Book of Beasts and Buddies is an interactive bestiary of curious creatures. Every page provides an encounter with a mysterious beast for you to befriend.â€‹ A Book of Beasts and Buddies was designed for the A Game By Its Cover (AGBIC) game jam. The premise of the jam was to design a game based upon a previously existing fictitious game cartridge. A Book of Beasts and Buddies was based upon Bestiary Logbook by Patrick Crotty. The Audio was done by: Myserval, Dreamreader, and Roni Yosko.
